body:
Comment 6: 
Mattn,

We won't be changing the way misc/cgo/life builds yet. We would have to wait until real
gomake will come along.

As to your github.com/mattn/go-xmpp app, please try to use goinstall to download and
build you package and examples. You must use "-make=false" goinstall flag, otherwise you
build will fail because mingw "mkdir -p" does not work with Windows paths, like
c:\a\b\c, properly.

Alex
_Labels changed: added **packagechange**._ _Owner changed to @alexbrainman._ _Status changed to **LongTerm**._
